creditline: Gift of N. Bud and Beverly Grossman
description: ovoid dish with undulating flat rim; slightly domed cover with organic finial in gold; interior of bowl has white ground with small flower sprays and insects; two figural cartouches on exterior of dish and two cartouches with flowers and pairs of birds; cover has two rondels with birds, two cartouches with peacocks and two cartouches with figures; flowers and insects surround cartouches on cover and dish
title: Serving Dish with Cover, one of a pair
